host.description: MQTT server host (IP address or hostname without mqtt://)

topic.description: MQTT base topic for Zigbee2MQTT MQTT messages

blackList.description: The devices in the list will not be exposed.

whiteList.description: Only the devices in the list will be exposed.

switchList.description: The devices in the list will be exposed like switches. (don't use it for Alexa, use lightList or outletList instead)

lightList.description: The devices in the list will be exposed like lights.

outletList.description: The devices in the list will be exposed like outlets.

featureBlackList.description: The features in the list will not be exposed for all devices.

deviceFeatureBlackList.description: List of features not to be exposed for a single device. Enter in the first field the name of the device and in the second field add all the features to exclude.

debug.description: Enable the debug for the plugin (development only)

unregisterOnShutdown.description: Unregister all devices on shutdown (development only)
